item.title: Mangampeta waterfalls near Kurnool
item.description: Mangampeta waterfalls is situated in Kurnool district, Andhra Pradesh. It will be around 305 KM from Hyderabad and it will take 5 hrs to reach there. The road is pathetic from Banaganapally to Mangampeta. The 15 KM stretch will take 1 hr. You need to walk few meters to reach the falls. The water falls are safe as the depth of water under the falls is approximately 3 feet. Kids will enjoy playing in the falls.
